known_issues: Deployment/build process encountered an error; requires retry to publish
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Close-up studio photo of bright orange jalebi spirals soaked in sugar syrup, on a small plate, high detail (dish-sakthi-jalebi.dim_512x512.png)
- Close-up studio photo of a vegetable frankie roll/wrap (flatbread roll) sliced to show filling, with chutney, high detail (dish-sakthi-vegetable-frankie-roll.dim_512x512.png)
- Close-up studio photo of steamed vegetable momos/dumplings arranged on a plate with dipping sauce, high detail (dish-sakthi-vegetable-momos.dim_512x512.png)
- Close-up studio photo of a fresh vegetable sandwich with visible layers (tomato, cucumber, lettuce), on a plate, high detail (dish-sakthi-vegetable-sandwich.dim_512x512.png)

existing_features.title: Generate new, correct dish images (without user uploads) for Sakthi Snacks menu items: Jalebi, Vegetable Frankie Roll, Vegetable Momos, and Vegetable Sandwich, and add them as static assets under `frontend/public/assets/generated/` using the filenames specified in the Image Requirements.

Update `frontend/src/utils/imageFallbacks.ts` so the dish-name mapping resolves these Sakthi Snacks items to the newly generated dish assets: `jalebi`, `vegetable frankie roll`, `vegetable momos` (including the existing `vegetable momos (6 pcs)` normalized key), and `vegetable sandwich`.

new_feature_requests.summary: Generate and replace menu/product images (e.g., Jalebi) without user uploads

Update the seeded Sakthi Snacks (restaurantId = 7) menu items in `backend/main.mo` so their `imageUrl` values for Jalebi, Vegetable Frankie Roll, Vegetable Momos, and Vegetable Sandwich correspond to the new generated static assets under `/assets/generated/` (or are set to an empty string so the frontend name-based mapping resolves to the correct new images).

projectName: Generate and wire correct images for Sakthi Snacks items (Jalebi, Veg Frankie Roll, Veg Momos, Veg Sandwich)
